title: A Lot of Fuss About a Duck
description: Lauren Liebman, Olivia Johnson and Julia Kettle have been friends since school, but by the time they hit their late-twenties their lives have gone in different directions. Lauren is newly married but secretly miserable, Olivia is flying high and partying hard, while Julia is underpaid, eternally single and repulsed by her own body.  But everything is about to change...  A girls' holiday to the South of France unleashes a chain of events, which turn their lives upside down and put their friendships to the test.
author: Elise Lowe
